short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Integrates an IDE into the expression builder on snaplogic.com.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Transform Snaplogic's expression builder into an IDE! Say goodbye to clunky, bland text editing and step into a real coding space. Utilizing CodeMirror, access over 65 themes, auto-indentation, and tabbing. Seamlessly read and write large expressions with ease. Elevate your Snaplogic experience today!
